title: Quantitative strong approximation for ternary quadratic forms II
abstract:
Let $F$ be a non-degenerate integral ternary quadratic form and let
$m_0\in\mathbb{Z}_{\neq 0}$. We study growth of rational points on the affine
quadric $(F=m_0)$ and show that they are equidistributed in the adelic space
off a finite place. This is closely related to Linnik's problem. Our approach
is based on the $\delta$-variant of the Hardy--Littlewood circle method
developed by Heath-Brown.
